name: Battlestage
description:
Battlestage

- co-op Twin Stick Shooter
- singleplayer campaign and survival mode
- up to four players muliplayer mode (online and local)
- play the campaign in co-op mode or survive in the survival mode
- play the survival mode with tower defense elements
- millions of possible weapon variations
- many skills and gadgets
- over 40 different enemy types
- level up system
- different side quests
- achievments
- online Leaderboards
